title: Mimi's Paper on Traffic Crashes Accepted by TRF
description: Mimi, Mahmuda Sultana has her first-authored second paper 'Demographic Risk Factors and Injury Severity Scores in Substance-use Behaviour related Traffic Crashes' accepted at Transportation Research Part F (TRF). She also authored two TRBAM papers for August 1 submission. Both are now accepted or published in two prominent journals: AAP and TRF, within just four months.

title: KAN Survey Paper Published on arXiv
description: We pushed Shriyank's KAN Survey paper to arXiv and are continuing to refine it. This work marks a significant step forward in exploring KAN-related surveys.

title: Deep Tabular Learning Survey Released on arXiv
description: Somvanshi, Shriyank's pre-print paper on the Deep Tabular Learning Survey is now available on arXiv. This work highlights substantial research efforts, and we hope to see it published in a top computer science journal soon. Lab members are encouraged to review this impressive paper.
